imageData.description: Description of the image data for this source, including the file format and the location of the data.

bdv.hdf5.description: Data stored in the bdv.hdf5 format, i.e. hdf5 data that is stored on the local fileystem.

relativePath.description: The file path to the xml storing the bdv metadata, relative to the dataset root location.

bdv.n5.description: Data stored in the bdv.n5 format, i.e. n5 data that is stored on the local fileystem.

relativePath.description: The file path to the xml storing the bdv metadata, relative to the dataset root location.

bdv.n5.s3.description: Data stored in the bdv.n5.s3 format, i.e. n5 data that is stored on a s3 object store.

relativePath.description: The file path to the xml storing the bdv metadata, relative to the dataset root location.

bdv.ome.zarr.description: Data stored in the bdv.ome.zarr format, i.e. ome.zarr data that is stored on the local fileystem with additional bdv xml metadata.

relativePath.description: The file path to the xml storing the bdv metadata, relative to the dataset root location.

bdv.ome.zarr.s3.description: Data stored in the bdv.ome.zarr.s3 format, i.e. ome.zarr data that is stored on a s3 object store with additional bdv xml metadata.

relativePath.description: The file path to the xml storing the bdv metadata, relative to the dataset root location.

ome.zarr.description: Data stored in the ome.zarr format, i.e. ome.zarr data that is stored on the local fileystem.

relativePath.description: The file path to the ome.zarr file, relative to the dataset root location.

channel.description: Optional channel to display from the ome.zarr file, in case it contains multiple channels.

ome.zarr.s3.description: Data stored in the ome.zarr.s3 format, i.e. ome.zarr data that is stored on a s3 object store.

s3Address.description: The s3 address for this image data.

signingRegion.description: The signing region for aws, e.g. us-east-1

channel.description: Optional channel to display from the ome.zarr file, in case it contains multiple channels.

openOrganelle.s3.description: Data stored in the openOrganelle file format on a s3 object store.

s3Address.description: The s3 address for this image data.

signingRegion.description: The signing region for aws, e.g. us-east-1

tableData.description: Description of the table data for this source, including the format and the location of the table data.

tsv.description: Table data in tsv file format, specified as root location for the table data.

relativePath.description: The relative path of the table data w.r.t the dataset root location.

imageSource.description: An image source. The source name (=key for this source entry) must be the same as the setup name in the bdv.xml.

segmentationSource.description: A segmentation source. The source name (=key for this source entry) must be the same as the setup name in the bdv.xml.

spotSource.description: A spot source, corresponding to a collection of points loaded from a table. The table must contain the columns 'spot_id', as well as 'x', 'y', 'z' ('z' is not required for 2d datasets.)
